entry.string: What is it?

The Authinvision module allows you to authenticate a user with your Invision Board database. The Authinvision module checks the username and password from the login screen against the Invision database and returns true for a match.

Authinvision does not log users into both systems at once, nor does it allow users who register on xaraya to have their user information duplicated in the Invision database. It is highly suggested that you turn off xaraya registration and use your Invision board's registration/password retrieval process.
How to use it?

Authentication by Authinvision is automatically available once the the Authinvision module has been initialized. You must configure Authinvision before a user will be able to login to Xaraya. To remove Authinvision authentication, you must remove the module or disable it in the modify config screen.
From the menu, you have one choice. "Modify Config".

Modify Config -- From here, you can configure the authinvision server that will be used for authentication. A user that has account information in Invision to be automatically added to the Xaraya database and allowed to login.
Included Blocks
usercp: a block that mimics the user links from Invision.
whos_online.php: a who's online block that replaces the one in the roles module.
Further Information
Further information on the Authinvision module can be found at
